CSGO is a great game, it allows you to have fun playing with your friends. I would definitely recommend trying it out if you have time.

I've dedicated every spare penny I've had into this game over the past 567 hours and OMG i'm broke, this game is among on of the worst I've ever played and is down their with my all time most hated games, I went into this game not knowing much about the story all I knew is that skins = wins, I recommend this game to any person who enjoys spending money and getting nothing in return, there is no ending of this phenomenaly bad game.

One of the best things about this game is that there is a feature that allows you to fucking delete the game

If this review has convinced you to at least download the free game and have a try, you won't regret it.
